attachments.title: 11 Brilliant Egg Hacks That Will Change Your Mornings Forever
attachments.text: When eggs are a part of every morning, the whole crack-and-scramble routine starts to feel, um, eggceptionally boring. Meanwhile, the perfect poach starts to seem too elusive, too confusing and altoge
